Class Reduction

java.lang.Object
org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core.ast.TypedSubtree<Visitable>
org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core.Reduction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitable
@API(status=STABLE, since="2020.1.5") public final class Reduction extends TypedSubtree<Visitable>
A typed subtree representing the arguments of a call to the reduce() function.
Since:
2020.1.5
